title: Change in practice of giving red envelopes

content.question: What does the article say about the practice of giving red envelopes?

choices.label: Because of Western influence, children now prefer to receive toys rather than red envelopes.
Giving a smartphone has now largely replaced giving money in a red envelope.
People now feel that it is safer to put a check rather than cash in a red envelope.
An increasing number of people send red envelopes via their mobile phone.

content.answer: An increasing number of people send red envelopes via their mobile phone.
